page.title: 07Employment
page.content:
Employment in the Coxheath area is as varied as one might expect in this part of the world. There is relatively little unemployment and much casual work on the many farms in the district. There is no single large employer within the area.
A survey within Coxheath Junior School revealed that of all working parents of children at the school:
{17% }worked in {Coxheath} {31% }worked in {Maidtone {34%} worked in {the local area {11% }worked in {London { 7% }worked { further afield}
Most jobs are in the service sector with very few people involved in manufacturing.
